summary: Doubting Thomas is the story of a twelve year old boy known for telling tall tales who overhears a plot to kidnap the President's daughter. When he goes public with his story, no one believes him, and he is forced to save her on his own.
cast: Forrest Landis|AnnaSophia Robb|Rider Strong|Lea Thompson|D.L. Hughley|Roger Bart|Timmy Deters|Taylor Momsen|Ezra Buzzington|Suzy Nakamura|Brian Posehn|Melanie Abramoff|Mitch Rouse|Andrew Hoeft|Shawn Prince|Ryan Sheckler|Jonathan Vilma|Taylor Gilster|Robert Debuck|D'Nette Pennington|Josh Berry|Jenny Gabrielle|Irene Estrada|Tom Schuch|Josiah Armstrong|Huckapoo|Evan Adrian|Anthony Jordan Atler|Keith Baca|Frank Bond|Cory Hudson|Brent Lambert|Manfred Leuthard|Lucas Ruggles|Janet Smith|Kim Thrasher|Omar Paz Trujillo|Terrance Willis
title: Spy School
